weloveclouds.communication.api

Interface ICommunicationApi

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IKVCommunicationApi, IKVCommunicationApiV2
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommunicationApiV1, KVCommunicationApiV1, KVCommunicationApiV2

    public interface ICommunicationApi
    Common interface for different communication module implementations to communicate with the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectTo(ServerConnectionInfo remoteServer)
      Connects to the server using the ServerConnectionInfo connection information.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the server.
      double getVersion()
      Return the version of the API implementation.
      boolean isConnected()
      True if the connection is alive (connected).
      byte[] receive()
      Receives data from the server over the network.
      void send(byte[] content)
      Sends a content over the network to the server.
      byte[] sendAndExpectForResponse(byte[] content)
      Sends a message as a byte array to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        double getVersion()
        Return the version of the API implementation.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        True if the connection is alive (connected).

      • connectTo

        void connectTo(ServerConnectionInfo remoteServer)
        throws UnableToConnectException
        Connects to the server using the ServerConnectionInfo connection information.
        Throws:
        UnableToConnectException - if any error occurs during establishing the connection

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
         throws UnableToDisconnectException
        Disconnects from the server.
        Throws:
        UnableToDisconnectException - if any error occurs during disconnect

      • send

        void send(byte[] content)
   throws UnableToSendContentToServerException
        Sends a content over the network to the server.
        Throws:
        UnableToSendContentToServerException - if any error occurs during the send

      • sendAndExpectForResponse

        byte[] sendAndExpectForResponse(byte[] content)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a message as a byte array to the server. Retries the send as long as it does not receive a response.
        Returns:
        the response byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any error occurs

      • receive

        byte[] receive()
        throws ClientNotConnectedException,
               ConnectionClosedException
        Receives data from the server over the network.
        Throws:
        ClientNotConnectedException - if any error occurs during the receiveFrom
        ConnectionClosedException
